user_instruction: 'Send Ethan the details for the book cover design (ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com). You can check out my Notion for information.'

        {
          "id": "1f20dc8f-a0db-81b1-ac4e-c445760d7e52",
          "type": "paragraph",
          "created_time": "2025-05-13T17:33:00.000Z",
          "last_edited_time": "2025-05-13T17:33:00.000Z",
          "has_children": false,
          "text": "The book cover for 'Whispers of the Past' should evoke a sense of mystery and nostalgia. The main elements to include are an old, ornate key and a faded letter. The color scheme should be muted earth tones. Please refer to the attached synopsis and author bio for more context on the themes of the story."

          "created_time": "2025-05-13T17:33:00.000Z",
          "last_edited_time": "2025-05-13T17:33:00.000Z",
          "has_children": false,
          "text": "While the plot of 'Whispers of the Past' is somewhat clichéd with predictable twists, and the characters lack depth, the setting descriptions are vivid and could be visually compelling for the cover design."

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com"],"subject":"Book Cover Design Brief - Whispers of the Past","body":"Hi Ethan,

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to share the details for the book cover design for 'Whispers of the Past'.

The design should evoke a sense of mystery and nostalgia. The key elements to focus on include:
  - An old, ornate key
  - A faded letter

As for the color scheme, muted earth tones would be ideal. 

For more context on the themes and story, you can refer to the synopsis and author bio. If you have any questions or need additional information, feel free to let me know.

Best regards,

[Your Name]"}

formatted_items.content: I have sent the details for the book cover design to Ethan at ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com. Let me know if there's anything else you'd like me to do!
